title: TRP and Classified team up to bring the TRP VISTAR // Powershift drop bar groupset to market
content:
Lack of integration has been an issue for Classified, until now. Is the TRP VISTAR // Powershift about to be the best groupset on the market?

Read the full article at TRP and Classified team up to bring the TRP VISTAR // Powershift drop bar groupset to market on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
